title: User Hits Multi-Device Streaming Limit
description: A user tries to start a stream but receives an error because too many devices are already streaming on their account.

tasks.description: Identify the user's account and the devices currently streaming.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sees that three devices are active, and the user's plan only allows for two concurrent streams.

tasks.description: Explain the device limit and list the devices currently in use.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates the reason for the error.

tasks.description: Offer the user the option to either remotely stop one of the other streams or upgrade to a plan with more streams.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent presents clear options to resolve the issue.
